structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.text:
As used in KRS 64.742 to 64.745 unless the context otherwise requires:
"Commission" means the Public Officials Compensation Commission; and
"Public officials" shall not include members of the General Assembly.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 486, sec. 21, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 32, effective July 15, 1980; and ch. 407, sec. 11, effective July 1, 1980. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 1, effective March 29, 1976.
